mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yisheng_uuid_number as yishengUuidNumber ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.yisheng_name as yishengName ,a.yisheng_photo as yishengPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.yisheng_phone as yishengPhone ,a.yisheng_id_number as yishengIdNumber ,a.yisheng_email as yishengEmail ,a.yisheng_delete as yishengDelete ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM yisheng a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.yisheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengUuidNumber},'%')
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.yisheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengName},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.yisheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengPhone},'%')
and a.yisheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengIdNumber},'%')
and a.yisheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengEmail},'%')
and a.yisheng_delete >= #{params.yishengDeleteStart}
and a.yisheng_delete <= #{params.yishengDeleteEnd}
and a.yisheng_delete = #{params.yishengDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
